content: कटः {@--1@} A straw mat; <ls>Ms. 2. 204.</ls> {@--2@} The hip. {@--3@} Hip and loins; the hollow above the hips. {@--4@} The temples of an elephant; कंडूयमानेन कटं कदाचित् <ls>R. 2. 37</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 37</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 47.</ls> {@--5@} A particular throw of the dice in hazard; नर्दितदर्शितमार्गः कटेन विनिपातितो यामि <ls>Mk. 2. 8.</ls> {@--6@} A kind of grass. {@--7@} Excess (as in उत्कट). {@--8@} A corpse. {@--9@} A hearse, bier. {@--10@} An arrow. {@--11@} A custom. {@--12@} A cemetery, burial ground. {@--13@} A time or season. {@--14@} The plant Saccharum Sara (शर). {@--15@} An annual plant. {@--16@} Grass (in general). {@--17@} A thin piece of wood, plank. --टी Long pepper. --टं Dust of flowers.
